{pages:['{"text":"My beloved Son!
If you are reading this, I\'m dead.

There\'s one thing, I want you to know: I love you, and always will be. Never ever forget about that no matter what happens.


 "}','{"text":"My son, here are a few pieces of advice you must also remember. 

You\'ll soon become a soldier, so just remember, you must always know what you\'re fighting for."}','{"text":"Being a hero shall always be a matter of choice.

I can\'t say too much as I can\'t be sure who\'s gonna read this, but please, be patient and curious, find out who\'s the enemy in our kingdom.
 "}','{"text":"Then just simply follow your heart.

I wish you a wonderful life.
Your dad."}'],title:"The last will",author:""}

lore.text: Adressed to Lukas the son of Evan
The last note written by the Evan
